comments:
We had this PR #59081 for CDT it turns to be something on
the CEditor:

1. Create a new file "Foo.txt".
2. Give it a line of text, and Save it.
3. Give it another line of text, but forget to Save it.
4. Delete "Foo.txt" from the project.

Try to save the file in the same filename again you get 

java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Attempted to beginRule: P/badfiles, does not

Reassigning to Core as that is where the IllegalArgumentException is coming
